measure.CatchLine: Extends sunset for program granting special assessment to historic property.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Extends sunset for program granting special assessment to historic property. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to the special assessment of historic property; amending ORS 358.499; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to the special assessment of historic property; prescribing an effective date.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of Senate Interim Committee on Finance and Revenue)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

sponsors.PresessionFiledMessage: Printed pursuant to Senate Interim Rule 213.28 by order of the President of the Senate in conformance with presession filing rules, indicating neither advocacy nor opposition on the part of the President.

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
